sentences.sContent: There are moments when he feels great frustration and it bursts out of him.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are moments when he feels great frustration and it bursts out of him.
sentences.sCn: 会有这样的时刻:当他感觉很好挫折和它爆发出来了。

sentences.sContent: Your frustration could be an indication that you just need some input or assistance.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your frustration could be an indication that you just need some input or assistance.
sentences.sCn: 你的挫折可能是在暗示你只是需要一些意见或援助。

sentences.sContent: But before you give up, I’d like you to ask yourself what your frustration is telling you.
sentences.sContent_eng: But before you give up, I’d like you to ask yourself what your frustration is telling you.
sentences.sCn: 但是，在你放弃之前，我希望你能问下自己，你的挫折在向你传达着怎样的讯息。

words.tran: 挫败；阻挠（frustrate的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: the fact of being prevented from achieving what you are trying to achieve
